dcaflib.containers.lookahead

lookahead.d contains the Lookahead class, which operates on ranges but is optimized for slices.

interface Lookahead(Param);
is an infinite lookahead of, if Param is a range, a Param, else an array of Params.

void consume(size_t howmuch = 1);
Consumes howmuch of the buffer.

T get(size_t howmuch = 0);
Loads in the buffer and gets howmuch of it, or the sentinel.

T front();
same as get(0) Implements a range.

bool empty();
whether the looked range is consumed

void popFront();
same as consume(1)

Lookahead!(Param) save();
clones the lookahead

T opIndex(size_t n);
same as get(n)

Lookahead!(Param) create(R range, T sentinel = T.init);
Creates a new lookahead from the range that gives sentinel on empty.
